trans-unit.source: Configures an <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection"></xref> configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 配置<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection"></xref>配置节。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> class using the passed parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref>类使用传递的参数。

trans-unit.source: The HttpHandlerAction constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: HttpHandlerAction 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction> class by using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection.Handlers%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction>类通过<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection.Handlers%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection.Handlers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> URL path.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"> </xref> URL 路径。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated class/assembly combination consisting of version, culture, and public-key tokens.
trans-unit.target: 以逗号分隔的类/程序集组合组成版本、 区域性和公钥标记。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of HTTP verbs (for example, "GET, PUT, POST").
trans-unit.target: 以逗号分隔 （例如，"GET、 PUT、 POST"） 的 HTTP 谓词的列表。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> class using the passed parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref>类使用传递的参数。

trans-unit.source: The HttpHandlerAction constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: HttpHandlerAction 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction> class by using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection.Handlers%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction>类通过<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection.Handlers%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection.Handlers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> URL path.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"> </xref> URL 路径。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated class/assembly combination consisting of version, culture, and public-key tokens.
trans-unit.target: 以逗号分隔的类/程序集组合组成版本、 区域性和公钥标记。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of HTTP verbs (for example, "GET, PUT, POST").
trans-unit.target: 以逗号分隔 （例如，"GET、 PUT、 POST"） 的 HTTP 谓词的列表。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow validation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要允许验证，则为否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, ASP.NET will not attempt to load the class until the actual matching request comes, potentially delaying the error but improving the startup time.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，ASP.NET 将不尝试加载类，直到实际匹配的请求，可能会延迟错误但改进了启动时间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> path.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref>路径。

trans-unit.source: The Path property can contain either a single URL or a wildcard string.
trans-unit.target: 路径属性可以包含单一 URL 或通配符字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> URL path.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"> </xref> URL 路径。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref>类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> type.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> validation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref>验证。

trans-unit.source: If the Validate property is `false`, ASP.NET will not attempt to load the class until the actual matching request comes, potentially delaying the error but improving the startup time.
trans-unit.target: 如果验证属性为`false`，ASP.NET 将不尝试加载类，直到实际匹配的请求，可能会延迟错误但改进了启动时间。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果允许验证;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the verb allowed by the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置所允许的谓词<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This Verb property can be a comma-separated list of HTTP verbs (for example, "GET, PUT, POST").
trans-unit.target: 此谓词属性可以是 HTTP 谓词 （例如，"GET、 PUT、 POST"） 的逗号分隔列表。

trans-unit.source: The verb allowed by the object.
trans-unit.target: 所允许的对象的谓词。
